TcHgHgFq2KNS0v08RE0N.title: Lange Nacht der Museen - Kulturforum Swing Party
TcHgHgFq2KNS0v08RE0N.description:
Bei der Lange Nacht der Museen wird auch gefeiert und getanzt.
Im Kulturforum /National Galerie findet eine 20er/ Swing Party statt. 
Claire & Diana tretten jede Stunde auf & gibt eine kurze Charleston Einführung. Ausserdem spielt Swingboper als Marching Band immer als kurze Set drussen, wo Essensstände und Getränkestände auch zu finden sind.
Auch sehr schön ist neben unserer Tanzfläche sind eine Weinbar und eine Cocktailbar. Ihr erlebt wie Kulturforum für Tänzer lebendig wird.
Zum Tanzan ist der Eintritt frei :D Komm´& geniess´ das tolle Wetter, schöne Veranstaltung, Tanzen, essen und trinken im Museum.
DJ Evan ist für die Musik zuständig. 
Verpasse´ die Lange Nacht der Museen mit Swing Tanz nicht! 
https://www.lan­ge-nacht-der-mu­seen.de

Kv3dqhS5ECeoVLkJsLKj.title: SwingStep // Panke Parcours
Kv3dqhS5ECeoVLkJsLKj.description:
Im Rahmen von Panke Parcours 2019 ist SwingStep das erste Mal auch mit dabei. 
Panke Parcours ist ein Kulturfestival direkt bei uns um die Ecke. Entlang des kleinen Flüsschens Panke werden 13 Bühnen mit unterschiedlich­stem Programm bespielt. Neben Konzerten und DJ-Sets gibt es auch Führungen, Film, Theater, ein Entenrennen und Workshops.
Kommt vorbei, schaut euch das bunte Treiben auf dem Parcours  an, tanzt mit uns und lernt den Wedding von seiner schönsten Seite kennen! ❤️

18:00 - 19:00 Swing Workshop für Einsteiger
19:00 - 20:00 Social Dance

7gDRnXiNlxXP3wOdnAWL.title: Back to School - The blunder years swing party
7gDRnXiNlxXP3wOdnAWL.description:
the end of summer is a grieving time full of holiday blues, memories of our summer lovers and PTSD flashbacks to the sound of buzzing mosquitos and screams of ice cream dipped children stampeding thorugh the streets. As we are all preparing to re-start our post-vacational routine, we’re propose you: let's have one last summer ball. 

But there are sacred rules to this party. 

1.    No one shall miss the photoshoot. Come in your best blunder years self outfit. That outfit you wore to your yearbook picture, the hardcore expression of your 15 year self, the one you would wear for your myspace profile picture, the one from when your Messenger username was xXxLadyDarkness­85xXx: we want to see it. Non-awkward pictures will not be tolerated in our photobooth. 
(Need inspiration? Take a look! https://imgur.c­om/a/FnYKJDn)

2.    NO RUNNING IN THE CORRIDOR.

3.    There will be no crowned prom kings/queens nor crowned competetors, but you can show your best moves in our trio showdown. (Need inspiration -again-? https://www.you­tube.com/watch?­v=kdQJaakCgcA). You can sign up for the showdown here: https://forms.g­le/Xs2cw3fESq21­mg2s9 

4.    Your parents are not letting you drive in their SUV yet? Come with your bike. A janitor will be outside from 21:00 to 22:30 to repair your bike for free. 

5.    Don’t be a dick. 

👾 PARTY SCHEDULE 👾


21:30 – 22:30 DJ Ana Maeso
22:30 – 23:15 Live Music (Band TBA!)
23:15 – 23:30 DJ Ana Maeso
23:30 – 00:00 Dance Trio Showdown 
00:00 – 00:45 Live Music (Band TBA!)
00:45 – 2:00/until we stand DJ Battle 

🎟️ PRICES 🎟️

🌟Entry: 
11 Euros normal price 
9  Euros showing your best blunder years outfit 


You can pre-register here: https://forms.g­le/qXKuGQBMNG7z­51AP6

📺  WHY THIS PARTY? 📺

Transparency is important to us, so here you go! The Cronopias been invited to perform at Blue Skies Lisbon 2019, but we need to fund our trip somehow. All earnings from the door will go to pay for flights and studio training times, and all earnings of the bar will go to the awesome staff of this venue that is helping us put this party together.  Not only you’ll be showing off your freshly cut mullet for the sake of 80’s haircuts beauty, you’ll also be doing it for a Good cause!

YXQI1DBT4Mjb4vZxiRrD.title: bauhaus meets charleston
YXQI1DBT4Mjb4vZxiRrD.location: festivalzentrum im bauhaus reuse, Ernst-Reuter-Platz (Mittelinsel), 10587 Berlin-Charlottenburg (Karte)
YXQI1DBT4Mjb4vZxiRrD.description:
Das Bauhaus wusste die Feste zu feiern: Kehraus-Fest, Weißes Fest, Metallisches Fest, um nur drei der legendären Feiern zu nennen – und immer mit dabei: die Bauhauskapelle. „das fabelhafteste war die bauhauskapelle. keinschlager. keine melodie. aufreizende monotonie. starker rhythmus. tempo“ wie schon ein Bauhäusler schrieb.

Die bauhauswoche feiert zum Ausklang am Samstag eine große Charleston- und Swing-Party, mit Live-Musik von „Kind of Dukish“ und den beiden DJ’s Wuthe und Swingin’ Swannee.

 
Eintritt frei

WZix13ET8WmZQ258OqvC.title: Old Fish Jazzband at Jockel
WZix13ET8WmZQ258OqvC.description:
Old Fish are a Berliner original- back when they were playing, we were still dancing Charleston in basement clubs with way too few fire exits, electro swing was just starting to become a thing (You heard Shemian - 1927 everywhere you went), and everybody loved Dixieland, even the electro folks.

Join us for some glorious blood-pumping New Orleans jazz from some of the widest-traveled musicians in Europe at the Jockel Biergarten on Wednesday!

Doors open with DJ'd music at 21:15. Band starts around 22:00. Dancing will take place INSIDE.

Entry 8-12€, sliding scale.

with DJ Capt'n K., who plays pure Swing from the end 20's to 30's, 40's and 50's.
Recommende­d dress code: 20's to 50's, but dress like you want.
Fee: 7,- to 10,- Euro (sliding scale).
Smoking and chilling outside in the second backyard.
Locati­on.


Swing Fever   –  mit Harald Hertel's Jam Swingers, – es wird wieder ein schweißtreibend­er Tanzspaß. Die Band spielt ab 22 Uhr 2 lange Sets, davor/danach Swingtanz mit DJ Capt’n K.: Lindy Hop, Balboa, Shag, Charleston und alles was die Füße können, zu authentischem 20er bis 50er Jahre Swing aus Capt’n K.’s reichhaltigem Fundus. Der Hof steht wie immer zum Verschnaufen und Rauchen zur Verfügung.


Dress­code-Empfehlung­: 20er- bis 50er-Jahre-Styl­e.
Eintritt: 7,– bis 10 ,– € nach eigenem Ermessen. Nicht verpassen... Flyer.
Das Line Up der Jam Swingers:
Julian Gretschel - Posaune
Florian Heidtmann - Saxophone
Daniel Hoffmann - Kontrabass
Haral­d Hertel - Gesang/Gitarre/­Kazoo

fdJGZkxhghvw3Rn5LTZA.description:
We're back with a newly-construct­ed floor. Drop on in for a dance in the green and glorious surroundings of Jockel Biergarten, very near the Landwehrkanal in Kreuzberg. There's beer, lemonade, and food there, not to mention plenty of sun- and all the fresh outdoor air you can breathe. (There is a bit of shade available as well.)

There are both indoor and outdoor spaces to dance, so we can dance in all weather conditions.

With DJ! Toss a bit of cash in the hat: your generous donations help keep the whole flying outdoor circus running.

lAEMUIdV6pAsKFjHxT1C.title: JAMMIN' WITH THE JAM CATS
lAEMUIdV6pAsKFjHxT1C.description:
Live music every week
2 dancefloors: 1 for Lindy & Balboa 1 for Blues

To find Freudenzimmer: Enter the first yard / first side-building, then second floor / left door

HEY, YOU COOL CATS! We have a new event for you! The Jam Cats live session carries on the legacy of the BLAUE STUNDE - strictly in danceable tempo! - mingling live sessions, concerts and DJ-sets.


We want everyone to have fun, dancers and musicians alike with a stage open for early Jazz, Jive, Swing, RnB, and other fun styles to dance to. The jam will be run by members of the Syncopation Society to ensure that the party flows, allowing everyone to dance, or to simply sit back and enjoy the music.

ENTRANCE:
5€ - 10€ sliding scale - Pay 5 if you're low on cash, or 10 if you got money to flash.

kqU8XxLQgexUXuV0ULX1.description:
The beautiful hall at Tangotanzen macht schön is just begging for a swinging evening. And so shall it be! Come and enjoy the finest live music in a brand new location with a wonderful parquet floor, professional ventilation, and, of course, glorious sound system. And a piano.
 
Eintritt 10-12€, sliding scale

21:00-21:3­0 Social dance floor opens with DJ
21:30-23:30 Live music with Declan Forde and his Orchestra
23:30-­close DJ
 
Declan Forde and rhis Orchestra are:
Declan Forde - piano
Pauline Peek - vocals
Dima Bondarev - trumpet
James Banner - bass
Ugo Alunni - drums


Die schöne Räume bei Tangotanzen macht schön sehnen ja nach einen swingigen Abend. So soll es sein! Komm und lass dich tanzbegeisternd­e Livemusik genießen- in einen nagelneuen Location mit wunderbaren Parkett-Boden, professionelle Lüftungssystem, und natürlich, ordentliche Beschallung. 3bTON7tENuTVW3CpShsv.title: JAMMIN' WITH THE JAM CATS
3bTON7tENuTVW3CpShsv.description:
Live music every week
2 dancefloors: 1 for Lindy & Balboa 1 for Blues

To find Freudenzimmer: Enter the first yard / first side-building, then second floor / left door

HEY, YOU COOL CATS! We have a new event for you! The Jam Cats live session carries on the legacy of the BLAUE STUNDE - strictly in danceable tempo! - mingling live sessions, concerts and DJ-sets.


We want everyone to have fun, dancers and musicians alike with a stage open for early Jazz, Jive, Swing, RnB, and other fun styles to dance to. The jam will be run by members of the Syncopation Society to ensure that the party flows, allowing everyone to dance, or to simply sit back and enjoy the music.

ENTRANCE:
5€ - 10€ sliding scale - Pay 5 if you're low on cash, or 10 if you got money to flash.
